question: How do I order my favorite product?
answer: You can order your products using our app or via this website.

question: How do I pay for my order?
answer: You can pay for your order using your credit card or via PayPal.

question: How do I know if my order has been shipped?
answer: You will receive an email with the tracking number once your order has been shipped.

question: How long does it take to receive my order?
answer: It takes 3-5 business days to receive your order.

question: How do I return my order?
answer: You can return your order within 30 days of purchase.

question: How do I cancel my order?
answer: You can cancel your order within 24 hours of purchase.

question: How do I change my order?
answer: You can change your order within 24 hours of purchase.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can contact our customer support team via email at info@klassicwatches.com
